summary.span: 提供用于操作绑定的静态方法，包括 、 和 对象。

span.span: Provides static methods to manipulate bindings, including , , and objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类公开一组充当数据绑定的帮助器操作的静态方法。This class exposes a set of static methods that serve as helper operations for data bindings.

summary.span: 如果存在，则从属性中删除绑定。

span.span: Removes the binding from a property if there is one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果给定的属性数据绑定与， ，或，此方法中删除相应的绑定表达式和还原到前任何本地值的属性的值通过绑定设置。If the given property is data-bound with a , , or , this method removes the corresponding binding expression and restores the value of the property to what it was before any local value was set through the binding. 如果给定的属性不是数据绑定，则此方法无效。If the given property is not data-bound, this method has no effect.

summary.span: 当项容器从可视化树中移除时，获取替换 的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that replaces the when an item container is removed from the visual tree.

value.span: 当从可视化树中移除一个项容器时，一个对象替换了 。

span.span: An object that replaces the when an item container is removed from the visual tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性，如果您需要处理的项容器。Use this property if you need to deal with the of an item container. 项容器是显示中的项的 UI 元素。An item container is the UI element that displays an item in an . 当是数据绑定到集合时，项容器为每个项生成。When an is data bound to a collection, an item container is generated for each item. 在某些情况下，会从可视化树中删除项容器。In some cases, item containers are removed from the visual tree. 其中删除一个项容器的两种典型情况是从基础集合删除项的时间和当在上启用虚拟化。Two typical cases where an item container is removed are when an item is removed from the underlying collection and when virtualization is enabled on the . 在这些情况下，项容器的属性将设置为属性应检查是否等于访问之前中项事件容器。In these cases, the property of the item container will be set to the property You should check whether the is equal to the before accessing the in the event for item containers. 有关项容器和虚拟化的详细信息，请参阅中的备注部分类。For more information about item containers and virtualization, see the remarks in the class.

summary.span: 使 对象能够参与对多个线程上使用的集合的同步访问。

span.span: Enables a object to participate in synchronized access to a collection that is used on multiple threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WPF 应用程序可以显示的数据使用集合或其子类之一 (， ， ， ，等等。)。A WPF application can display a collection of data using an or one of its subclasses (, , , , etc.). WPF 通道对通过子类的集合的所有其访问。WPF channels all its access to the collection through a subclass of . 同时并在其上具有线程关联创建的这意味着，使用不同的线程上禁止的将引发异常。Both the and the have affinity to the thread on which the was created, meaning that using them on a different thread is forbidden and throws an exception. 实际上，此限制适用于集合。In effect, this restriction applies to the collection as well. 您可能想要在多个线程上使用的集合。You may want to use the collection on multiple threads. 例如，你想要更新集合 （添加或删除项目），"数据收集"线程上时，"用户界面"线程上显示结果，以便 UI 保持响应时数据收集发生的情况。For example, you want to update the collection (add or remove items) on a "data-gathering" thread, while displaying the results on a "user interface" thread, so that the UI remains responsive while data-gathering is happening. 在这种情况下，您有责任确保对集合的同步 （"线程安全的"） 访问。In such a situation, you are responsible for ensuring synchronized ("thread-safe") access to the collection. 这通常是使用简单的锁定机制或更复杂的同步机制如信号灯，重置事件，等等。This is typically done using either a simple lock mechanism or a more elaborate synchronization mechanism such as semaphores, reset events, etc. 而必须同步对集合的应用程序的访问，还必须从 WPF 保证该访问权限 (特别是) 参与相同的同步机制。While you must synchronize your application's access to the collection, you must also guarantee that access from WPF (specifically from ) participates in the same synchronization mechanism. 为此，可调用 方法。You do this by calling the method. 若要使用多个线程上的集合，其中之一是 UI 线程拥有，应用程序具有下列职责：To use a collection on multiple threads, one of which is the UI thread that owns the , an application has the following responsibilities: 1. 选择同步机制。Choose a synchronization mechanism. 1. 同步应用程序中对使用该机制的集合的所有访问。Synchronize all access from the application to the collection using that mechanism. 1. 调用来告知 WPF 的机制。Call to inform WPF of the mechanism. - 必须在 UI 线程上进行调用。The call must occur on the UI thread. - 在调用之前使用不同的线程上的集合或附加到的集合前必须出现，取二者中较更高版本。The call must occur before using the collection on a different thread or before attaching the collection to the , whichever is later. - 调用重载，如果使用简单的锁定机制; 调用重载如果使用更复杂的机制。Call the overload if using a simple lock mechanism; call the overload if using a more elaborate mechanism. 1. 确保对集合和通知所做的更改的更改 (通过) 是原子; 不能从其他线程访问可以人工干预。Ensure that a change to the collection and the notification of that change (through ) are atomic; no access from other threads can intervene. （这通常是免费。(This is usually free. For instance，保证此操作，前提是同步受保护的所有更改。)For instance, guarantees this, provided that all changes are protected by synchronization.) 1. 如果调用，调用也必须在 UI 线程上发生。If you call , that call must also occur on the UI thread. 1. 如果你想要在多个 UI 线程上使用同一个集合，则必须调用(和，如果需要) 单独在每个 UI 线程上。If you want to use the same collection on multiple UI threads, you must call (and , if needed) separately on each UI thread. 1. 避免死锁。Avoid deadlock. 这是已应用程序的责任后它选择使用同步，但它还必须考虑到帐户 WPF 参与同步，如下一段中所述。This is already the application's responsibility once it chooses to use synchronization, but it must also take into account WPF's participation in the synchronization, as discussed in the following paragraph. 反过来，WPF 提供以下行为：In return, WPF provides the following behavior: - 访问集合并使用给定的同步机制。The accesses the collection using the given synchronization mechanism. - 维护用于集合中的"卷影副本"，在 UI 线程上。The maintains a "shadow copy" of the collection for use on the UI thread. - 事件队列最长可到达 （在任何线程上）。 events are queued up as they arrive (on any thread). - 挂起的事件应用于以异步方式在 UI 线程上的卷影副本时能够执行此操作。Pending events are applied to the shadow copy asynchronously on the UI thread when it has the opportunity to do so. - 不会直接使用任何其他同步机制对应用程序可见。The won't directly use any other synchronization mechanism visible to the application. 这是 WPF 的方法帮助避免发生死锁 （请参阅上一项 7）。This is WPF's way of helping to avoid deadlock (see the previous item 7). 净效果是，可以更改任何线程上的集合，这些更改最终显示在时在 UI 线程有时间"赶上"。The net effect is that you can change the collection on any thread, and those changes eventually appear in the when the UI thread has time to "catch up". 实现已被优化以从饱和 UI 线程并在耗尽对普通用户输入的响应线程更改流动到 UI 线程保持背景的速率限制。The implementation has been tuned to throttle the rate that changes flow into the UI thread to keep background threads from saturating the UI thread and starving the response to normal user input.

param.span: 需同步访问的集合。

param.name: lockObject
param.span: 访问集合时要锁定的对象。

summary.span: 通过使用简单的锁定机制，使 对象能够参与对多个线程上使用的集合的同步访问。

span.span: Enables a object to participate in synchronized access to a collection used on multiple threads by using a simple locking mechanism.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WPF 应用程序可以显示的数据使用集合或其子类之一 (， ， ， ，等等。)。A WPF application can display a collection of data using an or one of its subclasses (, , , , etc.). WPF 通道对通过子类的集合的所有其访问。WPF channels all its access to the collection through a subclass of . 同时并在其上具有线程关联创建的这意味着，使用不同的线程上禁止的将引发异常。Both the and the have affinity to the thread on which the was created, meaning that using them on a different thread is forbidden and throws an exception. 实际上，此限制适用于集合。In effect, this restriction applies to the collection as well. 您可能想要在多个线程上使用的集合。You may want to use the collection on multiple threads. 例如，你想要更新集合 （添加或删除项目），"数据收集"线程上时，"用户界面"线程上显示结果，以便 UI 保持响应时数据收集发生的情况。For example, you want to update the collection (add or remove items) on a "data-gathering" thread, while displaying the results on a "user interface" thread, so that the UI remains responsive while data-gathering is happening. 在这种情况下，你有责任确保同步对集合和从 WPF 保证该访问权限访问设置 （"线程安全的"） (特别是) 参与相同的同步机制。In such a situation, you are responsible for ensuring synchronized ("thread-safe") access to the collection and for guaranteeing that access from WPF (specifically from ) participates in the same synchronization mechanism. 通过调用方法，您可以执行此操作通过使用简单的锁定机制。By calling the method, you can do this by using a simple lock mechanism. 若要使用多个线程上的集合，其中之一是 UI 线程拥有，必须执行以下操作：To use a collection on multiple threads, one of which is the UI thread that owns the , you must do the following: 1. 实例化要锁定时访问该集合的对象。Instantiate an object to lock when accessing the collection. 1. 通过锁定该对象同步应用程序中对集合的所有访问。Synchronize all access from the application to the collection by locking that object. 1. 调用若要使用简单的锁定机制来告知 WPF。Call to inform WPF that you are using a simple lock mechanism. - 必须在 UI 线程上进行调用。The call must occur on the UI thread. - 在调用之前使用不同的线程上的集合或附加到的集合前必须出现，取二者中较更高版本。The call must occur before using the collection on a different thread or before attaching the collection to the , whichever is later. 1. 确保对集合和通知所做的更改的更改 (通过) 是原子; 不能从其他线程访问可以人工干预。Ensure that a change to the collection and the notification of that change (through ) are atomic; no access from other threads can intervene. （这通常是免费。(This is usually free. For instance，保证此操作，前提是同步受保护的所有更改。)For instance, guarantees this, provided that all changes are protected by synchronization.) 1. 如果调用，调用也必须在 UI 线程上发生。If you call , that call must also occur on the UI thread. 1. 如果你想要在多个 UI 线程上使用同一个集合，则必须调用(和，如果需要) 单独在每个 UI 线程上。If you want to use the same collection on multiple UI threads, you must call (and , if needed) separately on each UI thread. 1. 避免死锁。Avoid deadlock. 这是已应用程序的责任，一旦它选择使用同步，但它还必须考虑到帐户在同步过程中的 WPF 的参与。This is already the application's responsibility once it chooses to use synchronization, but it must also take into account WPF's participation in the synchronization. （请参阅详细信息，下面。）(See more, below.) 反过来，WPF 提供以下行为：In return, WPF provides the following behavior: - 访问使用锁定机制的集合。The accesses the collection using the locking mechanism. - 维护用于集合中的"卷影副本"，在 UI 线程上。The maintains a "shadow copy" of the collection for use on the UI thread. - 事件队列最长可到达 （在任何线程上）。 events are queued up as they arrive (on any thread). - 挂起的事件应用于以异步方式在 UI 线程上的卷影副本时能够执行此操作。Pending events are applied to the shadow copy asynchronously on the UI thread when it has the opportunity to do so. - 将不能直接使用任何其他同步机制对应用程序可见。The will not directly use any other synchronization mechanism visible to the application. 这是 WPF 的方法帮助避免发生死锁 （请参阅上一项 7）。This is WPF's way of helping to avoid deadlock (see the previous item 7). 净效果是，可以更改任何线程上的集合，这些更改最终显示在时在 UI 线程有时间"赶上"。The net effect is that you can change the collection on any thread, and those changes eventually appear in the when the UI thread has time to "catch up". 实现已被优化以从饱和 UI 线程并在耗尽对普通用户输入的响应线程更改流动到 UI 线程保持背景的速率限制。The implementation has been tuned to throttle the rate that changes flow into the UI thread to keep background threads from saturating the UI thread and starving the response to normal user input.

param.span: 可用于确保集合一次被一个线程访问。

span.span: You can use it to ensure that the collection is accessed by one thread at a time.

summary.span: 通过使用机制而不是简单的锁定，使 对象能够参与对多个线程上使用的集合的同步访问。

span.span: Enables a object to participate in synchronized access to a collection used on multiple threads by using a mechanism other than a simple lock.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WPF 应用程序可以显示的数据使用集合或其子类之一 (， ， ， ，等等。)。A WPF application can display a collection of data using an or one of its subclasses (, , , , etc.). WPF 通道对通过子类的集合的所有其访问。WPF channels all its access to the collection through a subclass of . 同时并在其上具有线程关联创建的这意味着，使用不同的线程上禁止的将引发异常。Both the and the have affinity to the thread on which the was created, meaning that using them on a different thread is forbidden and throws an exception. 实际上，此限制适用于集合。In effect, this restriction applies to the collection as well. 您可能想要在多个线程上使用的集合。You may want to use the collection on multiple threads. 例如，你想要更新集合 （添加或删除项目），"数据收集"线程上时，"用户界面"线程上显示结果，以便 UI 保持响应时数据收集发生的情况。For example, you want to update the collection (add or remove items) on a "data-gathering" thread, while displaying the results on a "user interface" thread, so that the UI remains responsive while data-gathering is happening. 在这种情况下，你有责任确保同步对集合和从 WPF 保证该访问权限访问设置 （"线程安全的"） (特别是) 参与相同的同步机制。In such a situation, you are responsible for ensuring synchronized ("thread-safe") access to the collection and for guaranteeing that access from WPF (specifically from ) participates in the same synchronization mechanism. 通过调用方法，您可以执行此操作通过使用同步机制，例如信号量、 重置事件，等等。By calling the method, you can do this by using a synchronization mechanism such as a semaphores, a reset event, etc. 若要使用多个线程上的集合，其中之一是 UI 线程拥有，必须执行以下操作：To use a collection on multiple threads, one of which is the UI thread that owns the , you must do the following: 1. 选择同步机制。Choose a synchronization mechanism. 1. 同步应用程序中对使用该机制的集合的所有访问。Synchronize all access from the application to the collection using that mechanism. 1. 调用重载来告知 WPF 使用机制而不是简单的锁定。Call the overload to inform WPF that you are using a mechanism other than simple locking. - 必须在 UI 线程上进行调用。The call must occur on the UI thread. - 在调用之前使用不同的线程上的集合或附加到的集合前必须出现，取二者中较更高版本。The call must occur before using the collection on a different thread or before attaching the collection to the , whichever is later. 1. 确保对集合和通知所做的更改的更改 (通过) 是原子; 不能从其他线程访问可以人工干预。Ensure that a change to the collection and the notification of that change (through ) are atomic; no access from other threads can intervene. （这通常是免费。(This is usually free. For instance，保证此操作，前提是同步受保护的所有更改。)For instance, guarantees this, provided that all changes are protected by synchronization.) 1. 如果调用，调用也必须在 UI 线程上发生。If you call , that call must also occur on the UI thread. 1. 如果你想要在多个 UI 线程上使用同一个集合，则必须调用(和，如果需要) 单独在每个 UI 线程上。If you want to use the same collection on multiple UI threads, you must call (and , if needed) separately on each UI thread. 1. 避免死锁。Avoid deadlock. 这是已应用程序的责任，一旦它选择使用同步，但它还必须考虑到帐户在同步过程中的 WPF 的参与。This is already the application's responsibility once it chooses to use synchronization, but it must also take into account WPF's participation in the synchronization. （请参阅详细信息，下面。）(See more, below.) 反过来，WPF 提供以下行为：In return, WPF provides the following behavior: - 访问集合，通过调用已注册使用以下参数：The accesses the collection by calling the registered with the following arguments: - `collection`： 感兴趣的集合。`collection`: the collection of interest. - `context`： 已注册的上下文对象。`context`: the registered context object. - `accessMethod`： 执行实际访问的委托。`accessMethod`: a delegate that performs the actual access. - `writeAccess`:`true`如果委托将修改集合;`false`否则为。`writeAccess`: `true` if the delegate will modify the collection; `false` otherwise. 你应建立同步对集合 (使用`context`对象和`writeAccess`值，根据需要)，调用`accessMethod`，然后发布同步。Your should establish synchronization on the collection (using the `context` object and the `writeAccess` value, as appropriate), call the `accessMethod`, then release synchronization. - 维护用于集合中的"卷影副本"，在 UI 线程上。The maintains a "shadow copy" of the collection for use on the UI thread. - 事件队列最长可到达 （在任何线程上）。 events are queued up as they arrive (on any thread). - 挂起的事件应用于以异步方式在 UI 线程上的卷影副本时能够执行此操作。Pending events are applied to the shadow copy asynchronously on the UI thread when it has the opportunity to do so. - 将不能直接使用任何其他同步机制对应用程序可见。The will not directly use any other synchronization mechanism visible to the application. 这是 WPF 的方法帮助避免发生死锁 （请参阅上一项 7）。This is WPF's way of helping to avoid deadlock (see the previous item 7). 净效果是，可以更改任何线程上的集合，这些更改最终显示在时在 UI 线程有时间"赶上"。The net effect is that you can change the collection on any thread, and those changes eventually appear in the when the UI thread has time to "catch up". 实现已被优化以从饱和 UI 线程并在耗尽对普通用户输入的响应线程更改流动到 UI 线程保持背景的速率限制。The implementation has been tuned to throttle the rate that changes flow into the UI thread to keep background threads from saturating the UI thread and starving the response to normal user input. `context`参数是任意对象传递给`callback`。The `context` parameter is an arbitrary object that is passed to the `callback`. 可以使用它来确定用于控制对访问的同步机制`collection`。You can use it to determine the synchronization mechanism used to control access to `collection`. `Context` 可以是`null`。`Context` can be `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建的新实例并将该实例与给定对象的给定的依赖项属性关联。This method creates a new instance of a and associates the instance with the given dependency property of the given object. 此方法是将绑定附加到的任意方法，可能不会公开其自己的 SetBinding 方法。This method is the way to attach a binding to an arbitrary that may not expose its own SetBinding method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法将绑定设置。The following example shows how to use this method to set a binding. 在此示例中，`myNewBindDef`是描述绑定的对象。In this example, `myNewBindDef` is a object that describes the binding. 绑定目标是`myDateText`，实例类。The binding target is `myDateText`, an instance of the class. [!code-csharp[BindConversion#BOSetBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindConversion/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#bosetbinding)] [!code-vb[BindConversion#BOSetBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindConversion/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#bosetbinding)]
